translation: This Self is said to be unmanifested, unthinkable, and unchangeable. Therefore, knowing this to be so, you should not grieve.
commentary: 2.25 Unmanifest unmanifested? Ayam this (Self)? Unthinkable unthinkable? This is this? unchangeable? This is this? is said is said? Therefore therefore? Evam thus? knowing having known? Anam this? Not not? Anushochitum to grieve? You deserve (thou) oughtest.Commentary The Self is not an object of perception. It can hardly be seen with the physical eyes. Therefore? the Self is unmanifested. That which is seen
